sources.title: The Shadow On The Window (1957) Jerry Mathers, Philip Carey, Betty Garrett, John Drew Barrymore
sources.description: The Shadow on the Window is a 1957 American film NOlR crime film directed by William Asher and starring Jerry Mathers, Philip Carey, Betty Garrett and John Drew Barrymore. He was the father of actress Drew Barrymore.   You can find out more about this movie from Wikipedia and there is also a review from the movie blog Martin Teller’s Movie Reviews .

metadata.Plot: Three teenagers, led by psychopathic Jess Reber, break into an isolated farmhouse and murder its prosperous owner whose secretary, Linda Atlas, witnesses the crime. The three thugs decide to hold her hostage. Detective Tony Atlas, perplexed by the sudden disappearance of Betty, his estranged wife, tries desperately to locate her.
